introduction: Use this tool to change your practical driving test to an earlier or later date. You must leave at least 3 working days to change your test date or you may have to pay again.
more_information:
You'll need 2 of the following: 

- provisional driving licence number
- application reference number
- theory test pass certificate number

Check your driving instructor is available on the new time and date.

%You can change your appointment 3 times - after that you'll have to cancel your test and book a new one.%

You must leave at least 3 working days to change your test date or you may have to pay again. 

^Working days are Monday to Saturday.^
overview: Change your practical driving test to an earlier or later date
title: Change the date of your practical driving test
